name: Obrigado - Churchill
additionalNotes: American Viking cigars are no stranger to Oak Glen Tobacconist. Perhaps the most smooth and refined out of American Viking’s line up is the Obrigado. Translated in Portuguese for ‘Thank you’, this blue labeled Habano is a Nicaraguan Puro from the Plasencia factory. “The Obrigado was the first-ever blend from Jim & Tim. This stick was released as a thank you to everyone who followed and subscribed online during their early days in the business of cigars. This blend is a Nicaraguan Puro, which means it only uses tobaccos grown, cured, fermented, and rolled in the country of Nicaragua. It offers a medium bodied flavor profile with a subtle spice on the retrohale. Included in the blend of this Nicaraguan Puro, you’ll find flavor notes of Cedar, Nuts, and Earth.”
